input.subject: Quote for Jolie Ni (SF to NYC)
input.body:
Hi,

Attached is the quote for Jolie Ni's move SF -> NYC.
Price: $7,800
Includes: load/haul/delivery
Optional: packing +$650, boxes +$200, basic insurance included.

Thanks,
Jessica

output.subject: Quote received for Jolie Ni (SF -> NYC)
output.body:
Hi Jessica,

Thanks for sending Jolie Ni's quote ($7,800; packing +$650; boxes +$200; basic insurance included). We'll review with her now and revert with approval or adjustments.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent
